item.title: Central Heating Basic Quiz
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Central Heating Knowledge & Quiz Level Basic Q-1 Bedroom RST should be set to what temperature ? 20 Degree Centigrade Note: Bathroom temperature should be set at 23 Degree Centigrade. Q-2 What amp fuse cartridge is used in a boiler and fused spar ? All boilers requires 1 amp The fused spar has 3 amp cartridge While MCB ( mini circuit board ) is of 6 amp Q-3 What device reduces possible noise and boiler lock out ?

item.title: About
